医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示非白人儿童唇裂手术的差异美国整形外科医生协会的官方医学杂志《整形与重建外科》11 月号上的一项研究报告称，非白人种族/族裔背景的儿童在唇裂修复手术的机会和结果方面存在显着差异（ ASP）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-reveals-disparities-in-cleft-lip-surgery-for-non-White-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-reveals-disparities-in-cleft-lip-surgery-for-non-White-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8584f200-d40a-4bd8-9ce8-dffaddc057bc Fri, 01 Nov 2024 12:03:18 -0400 Study reveals disparities in cleft lip surgery for non-White children
癌症诊断后戒烟可以延长患者的寿命在癌症诊断后六个月内戒烟可以使患者的平均寿命延长两年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Quitting-smoking-after-cancer-diagnosis-can-add-years-to-病人-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Quitting-smoking-after-cancer-diagnosis-can-add-years-to-病人-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d56e625-ec88-456e-90d9-a533cd1d969a Fri, 01 Nov 2024 11:46:36 -0400 Quitting smoking after cancer diagnosis can add years to patient lives
研究人员旨在改变军事人员睡眠障碍的治疗方法治疗睡眠障碍的传统解决方案，包括药物和认知行为疗法，通常无法充分缓解军事人员的症状，亚利桑那大学图森医学院的研究人员希望通过国会提供的 300 万美元拨款来解决这个问题定向医学研究计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Researchers-aim-to-transform-treatment-for-sleep-disorders-in-military-personnel.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Researchers-aim-to-transform-treatment-for-sleep-disorders-in-military-personnel.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6237de65-378b-4512-8d70-23f6bb50a49d Fri, 01 Nov 2024 11:34:00 -0400 Researchers aim to transform treatment for sleep disorders in military personnel
研究揭示多磷酸盐在神经退行性疾病中的潜在作用密歇根大学领导的研究提供了令人信服的证据，可以解开原纤维构成的一个基本谜团，这些原纤维在阿尔茨海默氏症、帕金森氏症和其他神经退行性疾病中发挥着作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Research-uncovers-潜在-角色-of-聚磷酸盐-in-神经退行性-疾病.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Research-uncovers-潜在-角色-of-聚磷酸盐-in-神经退化-疾病.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=243888cb-07a1-47c9-84f9-e5fb3cb90720 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 11:27:17 -0400 Research uncovers potential role of polyphosphate in neurodegenerative diseases
新研究将儿童体重指数轨迹与成人肺部健康联系起来研究人员研究了生命早期体重指数值与生命后期肺功能之间的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/New-study-links-childhood-BMI-trajectories-to-adult-lung-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/New-study-links-childhood-BMI-trajectories-to-adult-lung-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5d33efd-2ef9-4bac-bd86-f52aee52c2d3 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 10:24:00 -0400 New study links childhood BMI trajectories to adult lung health
Sapio Sciences 扩大与 AWS 的合作以推进 Science-Aware™ AI 视觉https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Sapio-Sciences-Expands-Collaboration-With-AWS-to-Advance-Science-Awaree284a2-AI-Vision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Sapio-Sciences-Expands-Collaboration-With-AWS-to-Advance-Science-Awaree284a2-AI-Vision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6bc7db01-efdc-48a0-b68f-7fdf3d67776d Fri, 01 Nov 2024 08:54:00 -0400 Sapio Sciences Expands Collaboration With AWS to Advance Science-Aware™ AI Vision
铁补充剂可能促进艾滋病毒儿童的大脑发育明尼苏达大学医学院的一个研究小组发现，为撒哈拉以南非洲地区感染人类免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）的儿童提供铁补充剂可能是优化大脑发育的重要第一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Iron-supplements-may-boost-brain-development-in-children-with-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Iron-supplements-may-boost-brain-development-in-children-with-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec527bbe-1b4f-4125-b9e7-6b7516a85bc0 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 08:45:02 -0400 Iron supplements may boost brain development in children with HIV
两种局部治疗对手部光老化显示出相似的益处美国整形外科学会官方医学杂志《整形与重建外科》11 月号的一项临床试验报告称，局部使用含有人血小板提取物或维生素 C 的产品可类似地改善手部老年斑（光老化）。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Two-topical-treatments-show-similar-benefits-for-photoaging-of-the-hands.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Two-topical-treatments-show-similar-benefits-for-photoaging-of-the-hands.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b506cef-4ff5-425b-95b7-64ff6c926d42 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 08:37:30 -0400 Two topical treatments show similar benefits for photoaging of the hands
思想年轻，保持敏锐？积极的老龄化前景与认知自我认知的改善有关研究表明，积极的衰老预期与认知健康的改善和主观衰退的减少相关，强调了心态的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Think-young-stay-sharp-Positive-aging-outlook-tied-to-improved-cognitive-self-perception.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Think-young-stay-sharp-Positive-aging-outlook-tied-to-improved-cognitive-self-perception.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d897112-7fc6-48d5-925c-88a977c94159 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 08:37:00 -0400 Think young, stay sharp? Positive aging outlook tied to improved cognitive self-perception
针灸有望缓解慢性肠易激综合症的症状最近的一项随机对照试验揭示了针灸治疗难治性肠易激综合征（IBS）的功效，IBS 是一种慢性胃肠道疾病，显着影响生活质量，并且通常对常规治疗产生抵抗力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Acupuncture-shows-promise-in-allevating-symptoms-of-chronic-irritable-bowel-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Acupuncture-shows-promise-in-allevating-symptoms-of-chronic-irritable-bowel-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=368706ba-5a8a-47d9-9b40-df156e90a69c Fri, 01 Nov 2024 08:24:00 -0400 Acupuncture shows promise in alleviating symptoms of chronic irritable bowel syndrome
